short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add new backlinks from the browser to your Backlinker Pro account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily log in to your Backlinker Pro account and add new backlinks to your list right from your browser.
- This extension requires a Backlinker Pro account
- Automatically enters the URL of the active tab, select from the backlink options, post the new site directly from Chrome.
- This extension will automatically add the new link to your account.
